wikipedia_page.main: George Elliott "Guy" Clarkson (1 January 1891 – 9 October 1974) was a British ice hockey player who competed in the 1924 Winter Olympics. He was born in York County, Ontario and died in London. In 1924 he was a member of the British ice hockey team, which won the bronze medal.
